methods.name: ConstantFoldingReducer
methods.logic: Constructor for the ConstantFoldingReducer class. Initializes the reducer with an editor, a JSGraph, and a JSHeapBroker.  These are likely used to manage the graph being reduced and interact with the JavaScript heap.

methods.name: ~ConstantFoldingReducer
methods.logic: Destructor for the ConstantFoldingReducer class.  Likely handles cleanup of resources held by the reducer.

methods.name: operator=
methods.logic: Deleted copy assignment operator to prevent copying of the ConstantFoldingReducer class.

methods.name: ConstantFoldingReducer
methods.logic: Deleted copy constructor to prevent copying of the ConstantFoldingReducer class.

methods.name: reducer_name
methods.logic: Returns the name of the reducer, which is "ConstantFoldingReducer".  Used for debugging and logging purposes.

methods.name: Reduce
methods.logic: The main function of the reducer. Takes a Node* as input and attempts to perform constant folding.  Returns a Reduction object indicating the result of the reduction (e.g., node replaced with a constant, no change, etc.).

methods.name: jsgraph
methods.logic: Getter method for the jsgraph_ member variable. Returns a pointer to the JSGraph object.

methods.name: broker
methods.logic: Getter method for the broker_ member variable. Returns a pointer to the JSHeapBroker object.
